tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Student (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(50),
    grade_level INT,
    enrollment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ARActivities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    duration_minutes INT
)

CREATE TABLE StudentProgress (
    student_id INT,
    activity_id INT,
    completion_date DATE,
    score DECIMAL(5,2),
    PRIMARY KEY (student_id, activity_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Student(student_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES ARActivities(activity_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ActivityResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_id INT,
    score DECIMAL(5,2),
    feedback TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES ARActivities(activity_id)
)

CREATE TABLE AR_Books (
    book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    book_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(50),
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    publish_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE Student_Progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    book_id INT,
    progress_percentage FLOAT,
    completion_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (book_id) REFERENCES AR_Books(book_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Achievements (
    achievement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    achievement_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    achievement_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE School (
    school_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    school_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(200),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(2),
    zipcode VARCHAR(10)
);
